name: Flick Sandbox
description: A falling sand particle simulation game with 25+ element types and realistic physics.
long_description:
Flick Sandbox is a falling sand simulation game built with Rust and SDL2. Features include:

- 25+ element types with unique physics:
  - Sand, Water, Stone, Lava, Steam
  - Fire, Ice, Oil, Acid, Salt
  - Wood, Plant, Gunpowder, TNT
  - Metal, Rust, Glass, and more!
- Realistic physics simulation
- Touch-based drawing
- Element reactions (fire + water = steam, etc.)
- Smooth 60 FPS performance
- 360x640 simulation grid
- Beautiful particle effects
